entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
